name: Digital Marketplace
description: This beta release of the Digital Marketplace provides a richer and simpler environment for technology procurement, enabling businesses, especially SMEs and start-ups, to provide specialist digital services to Government. Our vision is for an end to end digital environment which accommodates the level of simplicity creativity and structure appropriate to each procurement interaction.
target_users: Government buyers and sellers of digital services are the primary target user groups.

notes.title: What is the Digital Marketplace?
notes.body: This beta release of the Digital Marketplace provides a richer and simpler environment for technology procurement, enabling businesses, especially SMEs and start-ups, to provide specialist digital services to Government. Our vision is for an end to end digital environment which accommodates the level of simplicity creativity and structure appropriate to each procurement interaction.

notes.title: Who is the user group of the Digital Marketplace?
notes.body: Government buyers and sellers of digital services are the primary target user groups.

widgets.name: User satisfaction
widgets.definition: Overall satisfaction score includes all ratings weighted from 100% for very satisfied to 0% for very dissatisfied

widgets.name: Completion rate
widgets.definition: Percentage of transactions made using the digital service.
